pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 3     $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Villages, Witch huts $(br)> $(n)Breeding/Taming:$() Raw Cod, Raw Salmon     $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Attacks only $(thing)Rabbits$(), $(thing)Chickens$() & $(thing)Baby Turtles$(). $(br)There is a $(thing)70%$() chance for a tamed $(thing)Cat$() to give the $(thing)Player$() a gift after they wake up. $(thing)Creeper$() and $(thing)Phantoms$() avoid cats.
